title: Northern Ireland Housing Statistics 2017-18: Household Characteristics
description: The Northern Ireland Housing Statistics report is an annual compendium of statistics containing information on a range of areas relating to housing. The report is divided into sections covering: Household Characteristics.
datasetNotes: Data on this page identified as an Excel file entitled "Northern Ireland Housing Statistics 2017-18 Section 6 Tables Household Characteristics" under heading "Documents".
sizingNotes: A bit messy with footnote markers, different measures and mixed dimensions.  Will need a fair bit of up-front analysis
